attributes.action: Brexit Debate on 9 December 2018 to include Rees-Mogg & Farage
attributes.additional_details:
For there to be a true debate about the draft agreement, the debate should include not just Theresa May and Jeremy Corbyn. It must include Jacob Rees-Mogg and Nigel Farage.

Vote for it.
attributes.background: On 9 December 2018 there is to be a televised Brexit debate on the draft agreement between Theresa May and Jeremy Corbyn on ITV. Brexit transcends party politics. Brexit is about democracy. It is about implementing the outcome of the referendum.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because this would be the responsibility of the broadcasters and political parties and not the UK Government or Parliament as a whole.
